shinyscholar 0.2.0

    select_async

    select_async.Rd

    This function is identical to select_query but can be run asynchronously

    select_async(poly, date, async = FALSE)

    Arguments

    poly

    matrix. Coordinates of area to load

    date

    character. Date of image to load

    async

    logical. Whether the function is being run asynchronously

    Value

    A list containing:

    raster

    a SpatRaster object when async is FALSE or a PackedSpatRaster when async is TRUE

    message

    Information on the number of missing pixels

    Author

    Simon Smart simon.smart@cantab.net

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
 poly <- matrix(c(0, 0, 0.5, 0.5, 0, 52, 52.5, 52.5, 52, 52), ncol=2)
 colnames(poly) <- c("longitude", "latitude")
 date <- "2023-06-20"
 ras <- select_async(poly, date)
 } # }
